imdb.plot outline: Join 6-year-old Miaomiao, her puppy Doudou and a cast of animal friends on exciting role-playing adventures introducing young viewers to important social lessons and exposing them to Mandarin Chinese. Developed with leading language experts, Miaomiao is designed to keep children aged 2 to 5 engaged, laughing and developing new language skills.
imdb.title: Miaomiao
plot: Kids learn a new word of Chinese in every episode of _Miaomiao_ (qv) through fun stories and adventures.::Lofty Sky Entertainment

Join 6-year-old _Miaomiao_ (qv), her puppy Doudou and a cast of animal friends on exciting role-playing adventures introducing young viewers to important social lessons and exposing them to Mandarin Chinese. Developed with leading language experts, _Miaomiao_ (qv) is designed to keep children aged 2 to 5 engaged, laughing and developing new language skills.::Lofty Sky Entertainment
